Author: invincibletitan33
Text: In the same situation atm. Keep binging and then hating myself and telling myself I'll get back on track tomorrow. But then I fall in the same hole again. WHYYYY  You're not alone. Wish I could help in some way though ðŸ’•

Author: Sweetcountrygal
Text: Been there ðŸ˜”  I know it sounds near impossible, but try not to be hard on yourself and tomorrow (wherever you are as far as time zones), start anew and don't think about the previous day. It'll just throw you back into a cycle of self abasement and binging.
